choices: Miss Geradina's Butt(boss/owner of spa,Hippo Woman)
1.content:
Your Name Is Tim,your 26,and average man and just had the worst day at the office you managed,so you were headed to you favorite spa to relax,You went in But neglected to read the Sign on the door outside

*The Tired man spa has moved across town,this is now the Furry Feminent Spa,non anthromorphic animals may result in dna trasformation,Fusion,etc

Tim went to lay down in the jacuzzi he usally went to but started to feel weird

WHATS HAPPING TO ME screamed tim as he started to disappear into thin air and turn into a cloud of molecules and Float towards the nearest animal in sight

Now this was one of the spa's "off day's where not many furrys came in, there were only the 5 employs in the building along with tim

Tim was scared then he felt like he was fusing with some object/thing,when tim came to he was horrified to find out he had fused with.....
1.title: Tim's Furry Spa Transformation

info.brief_description: You are a guest in a spa
info.description: You are a guest in a spa for furries and you somehow get turned into something that belongs to one of the workers that works there
